## auth.UserInfo interface

Interface representing a user's info from a third-party identity provider such as Google or Facebook.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UserInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName](./firebase-admin.auth.userinfo.displayname.md) | string | The display name for the linked provider. |
|  [email](./firebase-admin.auth.userinfo.email.md) | string | The email for the linked provider. |
|  [phoneNumber](./firebase-admin.auth.userinfo.phonenumber.md) | string | The phone number for the linked provider. |
|  [photoURL](./firebase-admin.auth.userinfo.photourl.md) | string | The photo URL for the linked provider. |
|  [providerId](./firebase-admin.auth.userinfo.providerid.md) | string | The linked provider ID (for example, "google.com" for the Google provider). |
|  [uid](./firebase-admin.auth.userinfo.uid.md) | string | The user identifier for the linked provider. |
